Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN INSERT INTO ITSkills (SkillTyp, SkillName, SkillYear, SkillLevel, IdPers, StatusId) VALUES (@skillTyp, @skillName, @skillYear, @skillLevel, @idPers, @statusId) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN INSERT INTO PersonInfo (LastName, FirstName, Tel, Email, [Address], Age, Nationality, Strengths, Weaknesses, Objective, [Profile], SocialMedia, InfoSup) VALUES (@lastname, @firstname, @tel, @email, @address, @age, @nationality, @strengths, @weaknesses, @objective, @profile, @socialmedia, @infosup) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN DECLARE @salt VARCHAR(100) SET @salt = CONCAT(NEWID(), NEWID(), NEWID())
DECLARE @secretKey VARCHAR(250) SET @secretKey = dbo.GetSecret()
DECLARE @pwd_hash VARBINARY(64) SET @pwd_hash = HASHBYTES('SHA2_512', CONCAT(@salt, @passwd, @secretKey, @salt))
INSERT INTO [AppUser] (Email, Password, Salt) VALUES (@email, @pwd_hash, @salt) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN INSERT INTO Experience (Company, Position, [Description], StartDate, EndDate, City, Country, IdPers) VALUES (@company, @position, @descr, @stadt, @enddt, @city, @country, @idpers) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DELETE FROM ITSkills WHERE IdSk = @id END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DELETE FROM Experience WHERE IdExp = @id END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DELETE FROM PersonInfo WHERE IdPers = @id END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN RETURN 'Les fr@A1SierS S0Nt P3rch5 5ur le T@b0ureT 2 mon Gr@nd Pr6' END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[GetSecret] () RETURNS VARCHAR(250) AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN DECLARE @salt VARCHAR(100) SELECT @salt = Salt FROM AppUser WHERE Email LIKE @email
DECLARE @secretKey VARCHAR(250) SET @secretKey = dbo.GetSecret()
DECLARE @pwd_hash VARBINARY(64) SET @pwd_hash = HASHBYTES('SHA2_512', CONCAT(@salt, @passwd, @secretKey, @salt))
DECLARE @currentId INT SET @currentId = (SELECT Id FROM AppUser WHERE Email = @email AND [Password] = @pwd_hash)
SELECT * FROM V_AppUser WHERE Id = @currentId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
UPDATE ITSkills SET SkillTyp = @skillTyp, SkillName = @skillName, SkillYear = @skillYear, SkillLevel = @skillLevel, IdPers = @idPers, StatusId = @statusId WHERE IdSk = @idSk
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN UPDATE Experience SET Company = @company, Position = @position, [Description] = @descr, StartDate = @stadt, EndDate = @enddt, City = @city, Country = @country WHERE IdExp = @idexp END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN UPDATE PersonInfo SET LastName = @lastname, FirstName = @firstname, Tel = @tel, Email = @email, [Address] = @address, Age = @age, Nationality = @nationality, Strengths = @strengths, Weaknesses = @weaknesses, Objective = @objective, [Profile] = @profile, SocialMedia = @socialmedia , InfoSup = @infosup WHERE IdPers = @idpers END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT Id, Email FROM AppUser

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [dbo].[V_AppUser] AS
